animeDescription: An original anime project promoting the local Okinawa agricultural and industrial businesses and sponsored by the Okinawa Prefecture.  Set in Japan's Okinawa Prefecture the story is about three girls who are into music, dance, Okinawan stage productions and karate.   (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Ooshita Kyuuma', ['Director', 'Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Tsuruoka Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Katou Hiroshi', ['Art Director']], ['Sekiya Yoshihiro', ['Director of Photography']]]
